tcg.author: Alice
tcg.prompt: Generate test cases for user login functionality covering valid and invalid credentials, empty fields, SQL injection attacks, and password recovery.

tcg.author: Bob
tcg.prompt: Create test cases for shopping cart interactions including adding items, removing items, updating quantities, and calculating totals, including edge cases for discounts and out-of-stock items.

dbg.author: Carol
dbg.prompt: Debug intermittent database connection timeouts and errors in the Node.js application, investigating network issues, connection-pool misconfiguration, and resource constraints.

dbg.author: Dave
dbg.prompt: Diagnose why the React frontend is receiving malformed JSON from the API and failing to render components correctly, checking HTTP headers, JSON formatting, and error handling.
